actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that the aid to families with dependent children shall be payable with respect to unborn children.

summary.text: Amends title IV of the Social Security Act to permit the payment of benefits under the Aid to Families with Dependent Children program with respect to unborn children where the fact of the mother's pregnancy has been determined by medical diagnosis and the unborn child would be a needy child, as defined in this Act, if such child had been born in the preceding month.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that the aid to families with dependent children shall be payable with respect to unborn children.
